# The `MCBoundaryAlignFragment` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents required padding such that a particular other set of fragments does not cross a particular power-of-two boundary. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCBoundaryAlignFragment</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Represents required padding such that a particular other set of fragments does not cross a particular power-of-two boundary.

The other fragments must follow this one within the same section.

Definition at line 526 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h">MCFragment.h</a>.

The size of the fragment.

The size is lazily set during relaxation, and is not meaningful before that.
